"@apegacine":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/551b5e0c63687259db500100#post_551b5e0c63687259db500100
[bq="apegacine"]Sorry if this is More of a videogame thing but the "writer for the metal gear movie":http://www.siliconera.com/2015/03/31/metal-gear-solid-movie-to-be-helmed-by-british-writer-jay-basu/ has been announced and its Jay Basu. And if you never heard of him well here is his filmography on IMDB...
!https://40.media.tumblr.com/5fa162b8229731f0daf72e6a7855eb2f/tumblr_nm1veelujR1rslk3oo2_1280.jpg!
!https://41.media.tumblr.com/d135270d1234e6d173eb452450f084bd/tumblr_nm1veelujR1rslk3oo3_1280.jpg!
And I heard that he co wrote for a script that was voted runner up in the annual brit awards for unproduced screenplays. Which means the best thing he ever did was a movie that never got made. This does not give me any high hopes for this movie.[/bq]
Oh JEEESUUUUUS

I read that as "After mgs6 is a big pile, they’ll *bag* him to come back"

I can see it now. 

Konami: "Shiiiit! SHIIIIIIIIIIIIT MGS6 SUCKS GUYS!"

"Oh man Oh man what are we going to do!"

Employe: "Well, We could always get Koji-"

Konami: *"Get the bag and the Knock out gas"*

Kojima: "Hello, it is me Kojima! I'm here today to announce my new game! Its going to play just like Zone of the ende-"

*Bashes through the window and Ninja's Abduct Kojima*

Kojima "!" 

Kojima Productions staff: "Kojima? KOJIMA?! KOJIMAAAAAAAAAAA!!!!!!!!!!!"
